languages.text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.
languages.original_text: Поражает до 6 целей по цепочке в радиусе 6 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} псайкера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Игнорирует дружественные цели.

traits.locale_text: Сhains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level)+(psy rating)</u> damage to each. Ignores friendly targets
Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>((2 × psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage to each. Ignores friendly targets.

Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

languages.text: Поражает до 6 целей по цепочке в радиусе 6 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} псайкера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Игнорирует дружественные цели.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: Поражает до 6 целей по цепочке в радиусе 6 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг)</u> урона. Игнорирует дружественные цели.
Поражает до 6 целей по цепочке в радиусе 6 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг)</u> урона. Игнорирует дружественные цели.

languages.text: 释放连锁闪电，攻击6格内最多6个目标，对每个目标造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}+灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。连锁闪电不会攻击友方目标。
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: 释放连锁闪电，攻击6格内最多6个目标，对每个目标造成<u>（（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）+灵能等级）</u>点伤害。连锁闪电不会攻击友方目标。

languages.text: Alcanza a un máximo de 6 objetivos en un radio de 6 casillas, infligiendo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a cada uno. Ignora a los objetivos aliados.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: Alcanza a un máximo de 6 objetivos en un radio de 6 casillas, infligiendo <u>((2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a cada uno. Ignora a los objetivos aliados.

languages.text: Verkettet bis zu 6 Ziele in einem Radius von 6 Feldern. Dabei wird jedem Feind <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Psionikers)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt. Ignoriert verbündete Ziele.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: Verkettet bis zu 6 Ziele im Radius von 6 Feldern. Dabei wird jedem Feind <u>(2 × Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Psionikers)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt. Ignoriert verbündete Ziele.

languages.text: Enchaîne jusqu'à 6 cibles dans un rayon de 6 cases, en leur infligeant chacun <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} du psyker)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Ignore les cibles amies.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: Enchaîne jusqu'à 6 cibles dans un rayon de 6 cases, en leur infligeant chacun <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} du psyker)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Ignore les cibles amies.

languages.text: 6セル以内のターゲット最大6体にまで連鎖し、それぞれに<u>((2 x 異能者スタッフのパワーレベル x {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} + 能力者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。味方ターゲットは無視する。
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.

traits.locale_text: 6セル以内のターゲット最大6体にまで連鎖し、それぞれに<u>((2 x 異能者の杖のパワーレベル) + 超能力レート)</u>分のダメージを与える。味方ターゲットは無視する。

languages.text: 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki en fazla 6 hedefi zincirleme olarak çarparak her birine <u>(2 × ruhsezerin asasının güç seviyesi × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} + ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Dost hedefleri yok sayar.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.
